Curriculum

Welcome to PCS. This site will host the course curriculum and links to various resources that we'll use throughout the course.

Throughout the course, this site will continue to be updated. If you notice any problems, please point them out so they can be fixed.

Have Fun

We want everyone to have fun while they learn at PCS. An open, welcoming environment facilitates collaboration and learning. Please keep the code of conduct in mind and be friendly and accepting with everyone.
